amendment.description: To authorize the Secretary of Energy to carry out certain new plant projects for defense nuclear nonproliferation activities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1543 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1543 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Domenici. (consideration: CR S12589-12595; text: CR S12590) To authorize the Secretary of Energy to carry out certain new plant projects for defense nuclear nonproliferation activities.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1543 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1543 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Domenici.
